Package com.gcu.business

Interface ClaimsBusinessServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClaimsBusinessService
public interface ClaimsBusinessServiceInterface
The interface for the Claims Business Service, providing methods for managing claims. This interface outlines the operations that can be performed on claims.
Author:
Hugo Becerra
